thread.section_title: Cabinetgiant Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cabinetgiant | www.cabinetgiant.com
thread.title: J. Heine

author: J. Heine
title: J. Heine
text: Good cabinets for the price. The faces of the cabinets are top notch. I would rate them a 5 if the backs were a bit better constructed. I only bought vanities from them but they didn't have a strip across the upper back to attach them to the wall good. The strip that was there was really low and flimsy in my opinion. I added the 1x4 across it and added some corner bracing...simple stuff which made it way better. I also glued everything even though it wasn't needed. Not sure how kitchen cabinets were constructed though.
